kateacuff.comment:
The data suggests declining cases, but I don't know how reliable it is because many people aren't testing anymore.
Also, some kids still have severe symptoms even after five days.
So while there may be less risk of spreading, there might be more risk to their own health.
I'd like to continue requiring masks for another month or two.

grahampaige.comment: I'm sorry, but I was not present when we had this discussion. So based upon what has been said by others, I would like to vote no.
